data1.Desc: Cyclos 4.14 and higher should be installed based on the Java 11 engine due to the updated requirements of the application
An error occurs when trying to update the New Relic add-on on the PHP environment
An error occurs when installing GitBlit from the Marketplace
The '504 application down' error occurs after deployment for some Apache Ruby server versions
The WildFly service is not added to the chkconfig config
The Node-RED Dev installation from Marketplace should be restricted on accounts without endpoints permissions
The Rocket.Chat installation must be restricted for accounts with less than three nodes allowed per layer

data2.Desc: An error occurs when creating a new environment
Containers become inaccessible after unsuccessful firewall rules loading
An error occurs when redeploying Ubuntu-based images
OOM killer alerts should be enabled on containers by default
The multi-select field is displayed incorrectly within the showIf block for Cloud Scripting
Email notification about OOM killer alert is not sent for custom Docker containers
Default values should be restored for the Cloud Scripting setting if the appropriate element becomes hidden on UI
The High-Availability and Auto-Clustering features can be enabled simultaneously for Tomcat/TomEE
